nodes.text: Silood was a male Rodian aide and a confidant to Republic Senator Onaconda Farr during the Clone Wars.

In 22 BBY, he was present on Rodia during Farr's dealings with Trade Federation Viceroy Nute Gunray and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. When Farr was poisoned and killed, Silood delivered the eulogy at Farr's funeral on Coruscant and accompanied the body back to Rodia.
Silood was portrayed in The Clone Wars television series by Tom Kenny.
